ResourceHeader.Description: The objective of this experiment was to monitor the energy spectra and flux of electrons, protons and alpha particles with energies greater than 50 keV using solid-state detectors.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: Information about the Monitor of High Energy Particles experiment on the Ohzora mission.

Instrument.InvestigationName: Monitor of High Energy Particles on Ohzora
